short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track Genshin Impact stats in your browser.
short.ja: ブラウザでGenshin Impactの統計情報を追跡します。
short.ru: Проверяет статы вашего аккаунта Genshin Impact
short.zh_CN: 在浏览器中实时查看原神游戏状态
short.zh_TW: 在瀏覽器中即時查看原神遊戲狀態

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can track your genshin impact game stats in your browser in real time, all it takes is a few simple steps.

With notifications support and multi-account support
long.ja:
ブラウザでGenshin Impactの統計情報を追跡します。

You can track your genshin impact game stats in your browser in real time, all it takes is a few simple steps.

With notifications support and multi-account support
long.ru:
Проверяет статы вашего аккаунта Genshin Impact

You can track your genshin impact game stats in your browser in real time, all it takes is a few simple steps.

With notifications support and multi-account support
long.zh_CN:
在浏览器里便可以查看自己原神的游戏账号状态，例如实时树脂数据、周本数据等。

支持通知提醒/多账号切换等功能

反馈Q群：757411736
long.zh_TW: 在瀏覽器里便可以查看自己原神的遊戲賬號狀態，例如即時樹脂數據、周本數據等。只需要簡單幾步即可完成配置，支援多帳號切換
